name: between two sentences
content:
[dshow @ 0000000004dabd00] DirectShow video devices (some may be both video and audio devices)
[dshow @ 0000000004dabd00]  "Logitech HD Webcam C270"
[dshow @ 0000000004dabd00]     Alternative name "@device_pnp_\\?\usb#vid_046d&pid_0825&mi_00#7&316d5db0&0&0000#{65e8773d-8f56-11d0-a3b9-00a0c9223196}\{bbefb6c7-2fc4-4139-bb8b-a58bba724083}"
[dshow @ 0000000004dabd00] DirectShow audio devices
[dshow @ 0000000004dabd00]  "Microphone (HD Webcam C270)"
[dshow @ 0000000004dabd00]     Alternative name "@device_cm_{33D9A762-90C8-11D0-BD43-00A0C911CE86}\wave_{2B89B488-1611-4574-B524-38A86F459087}"
[dshow @ 0000000004dabd00]  "Microphone (Jabra UC VOICE 150a)"

dummy: Immediate exit requested
pattern: /DirectShow video devices \(some may be both video and audio devices\)[\s\S]*(.*)DirectShow audio devices/m
